content.rendered:
“Life was meant to be happy. Do you believe that? It’s true. I know it doesn’t seem like it when you look around, but it’s true. Life was meant to be happy.

You were meant to be happy. And if you are happy, you were meant to be happier. Even if you’re very happy, you can be even happier.

How happy? Just how happy can you be? Well… you can be happier than God.”

Since the publication of his worldwide bestseller Conversations with God, Neale Donald Walsch has been telling readers that a new understanding of God can change their lives and change the world. Here is Walsch at his best with the message that not only can you be happy, but that you are meant to be happy now!
